title: Renpure Organics Amazing Miracle, 8-Ounce
description: Our family has been making hair care products for over 40 years with over a billion bottles produced worldwide.  we became concerned about all the chemicals our family was exposed to on a daily basis, so we developed a new line of hair care products free from harmful chemicals.  we use only 100% certified organic extracts and safe, fresh, natural ingredients.

title: John Frieda Frizz Ease Smooth Start Repairing Shampoo, 10 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 2)
description: Frizz ease smooth start repairing shampoo 10 fluid ounce mends and blocks frizz for easy styling.

title: Onei MK-II Air Ionique Hair Dryer with Ionic Generator for Professional Blowouts
description:
**Please note: Some units include an old warranty card for a "one-year warranty." These old warranty cards are superseded by the manufacturer's upgraded four (4)- year warranty policy. ALL Onei MK-II Air Ionique dryers sold within the U.S. regardless of accompanying warranty card are automatically covered by the 4-year warranty.**

The Onei MK-II Air Ionique professional hair dryer is one of the finest and safest professional hair dryers ever made. Its feature-rich design lets you get salon-quality blowout results at home in minutes. 12 setting options give you more flexibility than other hair dryers. The Onei Beauty MK-II Air Ionique professional hair dryer features a powerful 1800 watt motor that does your blowout fast, but won't damage your hair like many 2000+ watt models. Its lightweight body and ergonomic design make it one of the best hair dryers for professional blowout use. Features: Ionic selector switch, low noise signature (75db), extra-wide temperature range (64F-221F), 2-position velocity control, pistol grip "Cool Shot" button, 3-meter power cord, anti-fire heating coil cover, ACLI safety device, thermal limiter safety device, and a 4-year no-questions-asked warranty. 100-120V (U.S.)

"Our promise to you: As a boutique company, if there is ever a problem with your order, we will do everything in our power to make it right." - Onei Beauty, LLC

title: Neutrogena Ageless Restoratives Anti-Oxidant Booster Serum, 1 Ounce
description: Ageless Restoratives Anti-Oxidant Booster Serum helps reverse the look of damage caused by sun, stress and pollutants with a formula fortified with an exclusive antioxidant blend. Potent antioxidants such as Feverfew, Gamma Tocopherol and Essential Soy help calm skin, fight the look of environmental damage to skin's youthful appearance, and smooth out texture while brightening tone to reduce the look of discoloration.
